description:
The sun has met its match with our Lost Sol collection. Designed to provide UPF protection for any occasion, these versatile tops are sure to find a spot in your bag any time you pack for adventure.

And the Lost Sol Hoodie for men is no exception. this super stretchy, water-friendly hoodie is perfect for life outdoors, from the trails to the water, and everything in between.
name: Prana Lost Sol Hoodie - Standard - Mens
